note.p: Chilean agriculturalist and politician. Studied agriculture in Europe from 1827. Co-founder of the Chilean National Society of Agriculture, 1838. Co-founder of the Banco de Chile, 1859. President of the Senate, 1864–7.
Biblioteca del Congreso Nacional de Chile, https://www.bcn.cl/historiapolitica/resenas_parlamentarias/wiki/José_Rafael_Larraín_Moxó (accessed 1 June 2021).
